sentences.sContent: And in fact it is just shown in percentages, less than a quarter of the painting itself deals with Hannibal and his army, and the rest is this swollen angry sky with the sun just flickering through.
sentences.sCn: 事实上这从画面的比例中就显示出来，整个画面中只有不到四分之一的画幅是描绘汉尼拔和他的军队的，而其余的空间都给了昏暗的天空、躁动的云以及闪烁不定的阳光。
